mapper.insert: insert into Company(companyID, businessCode, name, createDate) VALUES (#{companyID}, hex(aes_encrypt(#{businessCode}, 'okiwi')), #{name}, NOW())
mapper.select: select EXISTS(select * from Company WHERE name = #{name})
